text: Stanley Lloyd Kaufman Jr., known professionally as Lloyd Kaufman (born December 30, 1945) is an American movie director, screenwriter, producer and actor. He is the co-founder of Troma Entertainment movie studio alongside Michael Herz. He is known for directing The Toxic Avenger and Tromeo and Juliet.Leslie Pariseau. Troma: A Love Story.
